thread.section_title: Sitting on the City Walls (Beijing) Courtyard House - UPDATED 2017 Hostel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hard to find, but lovely
thread.title_full: Hard to find, but lovely - Review of Sitting on the City Walls (Beijing) Courtyard House, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Lakshana K
title: Hard to find, but lovely
text:
Not too much to add to what everyone else has said, but my pros and cons
Pros:
Great neighbourhood
English speaking, helpful hosts
Lovely little lobby space to sit down and have some tea
Jingshan park 5 mins away by foot
Cons:
Slightly hard to find, hidden away in the alley as it is
Nearest metro station is a good long walk away (buses are right outside though)
If you get the room 1 (?), prepare to have people walk through your room to get upstairs
